divs: sighting details5\24\12 traveling west through hartsville, in at 4:30am observed from my car on my right a circular orb orange in color and was pulsating. this was above tree height and was 300 to 400 feet from me. at arms length it looked to be two foot across (big)
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hartsville
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: DRIVING WEST ON ST RD 46 RIGHT BEFORE HARTSVILLE OBSERVED 3 TO 400 FT TO MY RIGHT PULSATING BALL OF ORANGE LIGHT
